actions.committee: Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Committee on Environment and Public Works. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.
Committee on Environment and Public Works. Reported to Senate by Senator Chafee without amendment. Without written report.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 238.
Passed Senate without amendment by Unanimous Consent.
Message on Senate action sent to the House.

actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.

actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Water Resources and Environment.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Water Resources and Environment

official_title: A bill to deauthorize a portion of the project for navigation, Biloxi Harbor, Mississippi.
subjects: Federal aid to water resources development

summary.text: Deauthorizes the project for navigation, Biloxi Harbor, Mississippi, originally authorized by the River and Harbor Act of 1960, for the Bernard Bayou Channel.

titles.title: A bill to deauthorize a portion of the project for navigation, Biloxi Harbor, Mississippi.
